definition: the teeming world/the world of sensual pleasures
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: He was dazzled by the gaiety and splendour of the metropolis.
sentences.chinese: 大都市的花花世界使他感到眼花缭乱。

sentences.english: We're just a passer-by yibingding, in this world collective game.
sentences.chinese: 我们只是路人甲乙丙丁，在这花花世界集体游戏。

sentences.english: During the day at night world, is a solo.
sentences.chinese: 白天里上演着花花世界，夜晚却是一个人的独角戏。

sentences.english: It's the light spots of relative intensity to combine together to form the colorful images of the world.
sentences.chinese: 由各光点的相对强度而组合成所有花花世界的影像。

sentences.english: The showy world in which her interest lay completely absorbed her.
sentences.chinese: 她所神往的这个花花世界完全把她吸引住了。

sentences.english: There is no outside world that i do not show you.
sentences.chinese: 我展现给你们的将是一个花花世界。

sentences.english: World, love enough, just can have so many excuses.
sentences.chinese: 花花世界，爱得不够，才会有诸多借口。

definition: lanterns red, wine green (idiom); feasting and pleasure-seeking/debauched and corrupt environment
lit. dazzling with paper and gold (idiom); fig. indulging in a life of luxury
great wide world/marvelously diverse world/(Buddhism) cosmos (abbr. for 三千大千世界[san1 qian1 da4 qian1 shi4 jie4])
wind, flower, snow and moon, trite poetry subject (idiom); effete language without substance/love affair/romance is in the air/dissipated life
lit. to enjoy the beautiful spring scenery (idiom)/fig. to frequent brothels/to sow one's wild oats
red flowers and green willow/all the colors of spring
to spend one's time in drinking and pleasure (idiom); to indulge in sensual pleasures/life of debauchery
to loiter (i.e. reluctant to leave)/to linger on
lit. to pick the flowers and trample the grass (idiom)/fig. to womanize/to frequent brothels/to sow one's wild oats
indulge in pleasure and forget home and duty (idiom)
